input_text:
Job Title: Inside Sales Representative

Location: Aurora, OH

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Description 

Monday-Friday 8am-5pm -Make outbound calls to leads that have been acquired through networking and other sales avenues prior -Will be calling on contractors (electrical, home building, etc.) to see their interest in using their products -If the contractor seems open to working with them, they will pass the call off to a Territory Sales Manager in most cases -They will also follow up on missed calls from those who are returning their messages -Actively support the company’s culture and business mission -Prioritize call activity to customers to uncover new opportunities -Research, define and initiate outreach to new customer prospects / sales opportunities through outbound calls and emails -Deliver scripted talks that describe the company’s products or services -Obtaining customer information such as name and address for shipping products -Track customer’s contact information and log all call activity in Salesforce.com. -Facilitate growth and development of existing customers by building solid relationships, promoting and providing education of products -Understand customer needs and requirements Meet or exceed performance metrics for outbound calls -Engage in appropriate training opportunities relative to business and product knowledge and enhancements to maintain continuous education for self-development

 Skills 

sales, Customer service, Call center, Inside sale

 Top Skills Details 

sales

 Additional Skills & Qualifications 

Must Have: -call center, customer service, or inside sales experience

 Experience Level 

Expert Level

 About TEKsystems 

We're partners in transformation. We help clients activate ideas and solutions to take advantage of a new world of opportunity. We are a team of 80,000 strong, working with over 6,000 clients, including 80% of the Fortune 500, across North America, Europe and Asia. As an industry leader in Full-Stack Technology Services, Talent Services, and real-world application, we work with progressive leaders to drive change. That's the power of true partnership. TEKsystems is an Allegis Group company.

The company is an equal opportunity employer and will consider all applications without regards to race, sex, age, color, religion, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information or any characteristic protected by law.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Inside Sales Representative
soft_skills: Active support of company culture and business mission
Promoting and providing education of products
job_responsibilities: - Call on contractors to gauge interest in products
- Pass calls to Territory Sales Managers when appropriate
- Actively support company culture and mission
- Prioritize call activity to uncover opportunities
- Research and initiate outreach to new prospects
- Deliver scripted talks about products or services
output_json.company_information: TEKsystems is a partner in transformation, offering Full-Stack Technology Services, Talent Services, and real-world application solutions. They work with over 6,000 clients, including 80% of the Fortune 500, across North America, Europe, and Asia.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: The company is an equal opportunity employer considering all applications without regard to race, sex, age, color, religion, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information, or any characteristic protected by law.
